thread.title: Leicester City fans troll Sevilla with chant during Champions League clash | Metro News
thread.title_full: Leicester City fans troll Sevilla with chant during Champions League clash | Metro News

author: Metro Sport Reporter For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Leicester City fans troll Sevilla with chant during Champions League clash | Metro News

organizations.name: metro news metro sport reporter for metro.co.uk

text:
Metro Sport Reporter for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 9:11 pm Leicester City fans 1-0 Sevilla fans (Picture: Getty) 
Leicester City fans have had little to cheer about this season but they raised a smile with a cheeky chant aimed at Champions League last-16 opponents Sevilla on Wednesday night. 
The Foxes face the serious prospect of being relegated just 12 months after being crowned Premier League champions last term. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
Claudio Ranieri’s men were outclassed by Jorge Sampaoli’s side during the first half and entered the break 1-0 down thanks to Pablo Sarabia’s fine header. 
Leicester had just 20% possession in the first half but the club’s travelling support appeared to still be in a chipper mood with their chant for the home fans.
